snippet: parama|arhaiḥ|api śākya| rāja |sūnuḥ na jagāma dhṛtiṃ
drumābjaketuḥ abhiruhya saḥ kanthakam sat|aśvam prayayau ketum|iva

# 1 sa tathā viṣayairvilobhyamānaḥ paramārhairapi śākyarājasūnuḥ saḥ tathā viṣayaiḥ|vilobhyamānaḥ parama|arhaiḥ|api śākya|rāja|sūnuḥ na jagāma dhṛtiṃ na śarma lebhe hṛdaye siṃha ivātidigdhaviddhaḥ na jagāma dhṛtim na śarma lebhe hṛdaye siṃhaḥ iva|ati|digdha|viddhaḥ # 2 atha mantrisutaiḥ kṣamaiḥ kadācitsakhibhiścitrakathaiḥ kṛtānuyātraḥ atha mantri|sutaiḥ kṣamaiḥ kadācid|sakhibhiḥ|citra|kathaiḥ kṛta|anuyātraḥ vanabhūmididṛkṣayā śamepsurnaradevānumato bahiḥ pratasthe vana|bhūmi|didṛkṣayā śama|īpsuḥ|naradeva|anumataḥ bahis pratasthe # 3 navarukmakhalīnakiṅkiṇīkaṃ pracalaccāmaracāruhemabhāṇḍam nava|rukma|khalīna|kiṅkiṇīkam pracalat|cāmara|cāru|hema|bhāṇḍam abhiruhya sa kanthakaṃ sadaśvaṃ prayayau ketumiva drumābjaketuḥ abhiruhya saḥ kanthakam sat|aśvam prayayau ketum|iva druma|abja|ketuḥ # 4 sa vikṛṣṭatarāṃ vanāntabhūmiṃ vanalobhācca yayau mahīguṇācca saḥ vikṛṣṭatarām vanānta|bhūmim vana|lobhāt|ca yayau mahī|guṇāt|ca salilormivikārasīramārgāṃ vasudhāṃ caiva dadarśa kṛṣyamāṇām salila|ūrmi|vikāra|sīra|mārgām vasudhām ca|eva dadarśa kṛṣyamāṇām # 5 halabhinnavikīrṇaśaṣpadarbhāṃ hatasūkṣmakrimikīṭajantukīrṇām hala|bhinna|vikīrṇa|śaṣpa|darbhām hata|sūkṣma|krimi|kīṭa|jantu|kīrṇām samavekṣya rasāṃ tathāvidhāṃ tāṃ svajanasyeva vadhe bhṛśaṃ śuśoca samavekṣya rasām tathāvidhām tām sva|janasya|iva vadhe bhṛśam śuśoca # 6 kṛṣataḥ puruṣāṃśca vīkṣamāṇaḥ pavanārkāṃśurajovibhinnavarṇān kṛṣataḥ puruṣān|ca vīkṣamāṇaḥ pavana|arka|aṃśu|rajas|vibhinna|varṇān vahanaklamaviklavāṃśca dhuryān paramāryaḥ paramāṃ kṛpāṃ cakāra vahana|klama|viklavān|ca dhuryān parama|āryaḥ paramām kṛpām cakāra # 7 avatīrya tatasturaṅgapṛṣṭhācchanakairgā vyacaracchucā parītaḥ avatīrya tatas|turaṃga|pṛṣṭhāt|śanakais|gāḥ vyacarat|śucā parītaḥ jagato jananavyayaṃ vicinvan kṛpaṇaṃ khalvidamityuvāca cārtaḥ jagantaḥ janana|vyayam vicinvan kṛpaṇam khalu|idam|iti|uvāca ca|ārtaḥ # 8 manasā ca viviktatāmabhīpsuḥ suhṛdastānanuyāyino nivārya manasā ca vivikta|tām|abhīpsuḥ suhṛdaḥ|tān|anuyāyinaḥ nivārya abhitaścalacāruparṇavatyā vijane mūlamupeyivān sa jambvāḥ abhitas|cala|cāru|parṇavatyāḥ vijane mūlam|upeyivāḥ saḥ jambvaḥ # 9 niṣasāda sa yatra śaucavatyāṃ bhuvi vaidūryanikāśaśādvalāyām niṣasāda saḥ yatra śaucavatyām bhuvi vaiḍūrya|nikāśa|śādvalāyām jagataḥ prabhavavyayau vicinvanmanasaśca sthitimārgamālalambe jagantaḥ prabhava|vyayau vicinvan|manasaḥ|ca sthiti|mārgam|ālalambe # 10 samavāptamanaḥsthitiśca sadyo viṣayecchādibhirādhibhiśca muktaḥ samavāpta|manas|sthitiḥ|ca sadyas viṣaya|icchā|ādibhiḥ|ādhibhiḥ|ca muktaḥ savitarkavicāramāpa śāntaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam anāsravaprakāram sa|vitarka|vicāram|āpa śāntam prathamam dhyānam anāsrava|prakāram # 11 adhigamya tato vivekajaṃ tu paramaprītisukhaṃ manaḥsamādhim adhigamya tatas viveka|jam tu parama|prīti|sukham manas|samādhim idameva tataḥ paraṃ pradadhyau manasā lokagatiṃ niśāmya samyak idam|eva tatas param pradadhyau manasā loka|gatim niśāmya samyak # 12 kṛpaṇaṃ bata yajjanaḥ svayaṃ sannavaśo vyādhijarāvināśadharmā kṛpaṇam bata yat|janaḥ svayam san|avaśaḥ vyādhi|jarā|vināśa|dharmā jarayārditamāturaṃ mṛtaṃ vā paramajño vijugupsate madāndhaḥ jarayā|arditam|āturam mṛtam vā param|ajñaḥ vijugupsate mada|andhaḥ # 13 iha cedahamīdṛśaḥ svayaṃ san vijugupseya paraṃ tathāsvabhāvam iha ced|aham|īdṛśaḥ svayam san vijugupseya param tathā|svabhāvam na bhavetsadṛśaṃ hi tatkṣamaṃ vā paramaṃ dharmamimaṃ vijānato me na bhavet|sadṛśam hi tat|kṣamam vā paramam dharmam|imam vijānataḥ mama # 14 iti tasya vipaśyato yathāvajjagato vyādhijarāvipattidoṣān iti tasya vipaśyataḥ yathāvat|jagantaḥ vyādhi|jarā|vipatti|doṣān balayauvanajīvitapravṛtto vijagāmātmagato madaḥ kṣaṇena bala|yauvana|jīvita|pravṛttaḥ vijagāma|ātma|gataḥ madaḥ kṣaṇena # 15 na jaharṣa na cāpi cānutepe vicikitsāṃ na yayau na na jaharṣa na ca|api ca|anutepe vicikitsām na yayau na na ca kāmaguṇeṣu saṃrarañje na vididveṣa paraṃ na cāvamene na ca kāma|guṇeṣu saṃrarañje na vididveṣa param na ca|avamene # 16 iti buddhiriyaṃ ca nīrajaskā vavṛdhe tasya mahātmano viśuddhā iti buddhiḥ|iyam ca nīrajaskā vavṛdhe tasya mahātmanaḥ viśuddhā puruṣairaparairadṛśyamānaḥ puruṣaścopasasarpa bhikṣuveṣaḥ puruṣaiḥ|aparaiḥ|adṛśyamānaḥ puruṣaḥ|ca|upasasarpa bhikṣu|veṣaḥ # 17 naradevasutastamabhyapṛcchadvada
lebhe hṛdaye siṃhaḥ iva| ati|digdha |viddhaḥ # 2 atha mantrisutaiḥ
ketumiva drumābjaketuḥ abhiruhya saḥ kanthakam sat|aśvam
abhiruhya saḥ kanthakam sat| aśvam prayayau ketum|iva druma|abja|ketuḥ
vaidūryanikāśaśādvalāyām niṣasāda saḥ yatra śaucavatyām bhuvi
vyādhijarāvināśadharmā kṛpaṇam bata yat| janaḥ svayam san|avaśaḥ vyādhi|jarā|vināśa|dharmā
tathāsvabhāvam iha ced| aham |īdṛśaḥ svayam san vijugupseya

param na ca|avamene # 16 iti buddhiriyaṃ ca nīrajaskā vavṛdhe tasya mahātmano viśuddhā iti buddhiḥ|iyam ca nīrajaskā vavṛdhe tasya mahātmanaḥ viśuddhā puruṣairaparairadṛśyamānaḥ puruṣaścopasasarpa bhikṣuveṣaḥ puruṣaiḥ|aparaiḥ|adṛśyamānaḥ puruṣaḥ|ca|upasasarpa bhikṣu|veṣaḥ # 17 naradevasutastamabhyapṛcchadvada ko 'sīti śaśaṃsa so 'tha tasmai naradeva|sutaḥ|tam|abhyapṛcchat|vada kaḥ asi|iti śaśaṃsa saḥ atha tasmai narapuṃgava janmamṛtyubhītaḥ śramaṇaḥ pravrajito 'smi mokṣahetoḥ nara|puṃgavaiḥ janma|mṛtyu|bhītaḥ śramaṇaḥ pravrajitaḥ asmi mokṣa|hetoḥ # 18 jagati kṣayadharmake mumukṣurmṛgaye 'haṃ śivamakṣayaṃ padaṃ tat jaganti kṣaya|dharmake mumukṣuḥ|mṛgaye aham śivam|akṣayam padam tat svajane 'nyajane ca tulyabuddhirviṣayebhyo vinivṛttarāgadoṣaḥ sva|jane anya|jane ca tulya|buddhiḥ|viṣayebhyaḥ vinivṛtta|rāga|doṣaḥ # 19 nivasan kvacideva vṛkṣamūle vijane vāyatane girau vane vā nivasan kvacid|eva vṛkṣa|mūle vijane vā|āyatane girau vane vā vicarāmyaparigraho nirāśaḥ paramārthāya yathopapannabhaikṣaḥ vicarāmi|aparigrahaḥ nirāśaḥ paramārthāya yathā|upapanna|bhaikṣaḥ # 20 iti paśyata eva rājasūnoridamuktvā sa nabhaḥ samutpapāta iti paśyataḥ eva rāja|sūnoḥ|idam|uktvā saḥ nabhaḥ samutpapāta sa hi tadvapuranyabuddhadarśī smṛtaye tasya sameyivāndivaukāḥ saḥ hi tad|vapūḥ|anya|buddha|darśī smṛtaye tasya sameyivāḥ|divaukāḥ # 21 gaganaṃ khagavadgate ca tasmin nṛvaraḥ saṃjahṛṣe visismiye ca gaganam khaga|vat|gate ca tasmin nṛvaraḥ saṃjahṛṣe visismiye ca upalabhya tataśca dharmasaṃjñāmabhiniryāṇavidhau matiṃ cakāra upalabhya tatas|ca dharma|saṃjñām|abhiniryāṇa|vidhau matim cakāra # 22 tata indrasamo
vṛkṣa|mūle vijane vā| āyatane girau vane vā vicarāmyaparigraho
vṛkṣa|mūle vijane vā|āyatane girau vane vā vicarāmyaparigraho
vijane vā|āyatane girau vane vā vicarāmyaparigraho
paramārthāya yathā|upapanna| bhaikṣaḥ # 20 iti paśyata eva
20 iti paśyata eva rājasūno ridamuktvā sa nabhaḥ
samutpapāta iti paśyataḥ eva rāja|sūnoḥ |idam|uktvā saḥ nabhaḥ
rāja|sūnoḥ|idam|uktvā saḥ nabhaḥ samutpapāta sa hi
rāja|sūnoḥ|idam|uktvā saḥ nabhaḥ samutpapāta sa hi tadvapuranyabuddhadarśī
saḥ hi tad|vapūḥ|anya| buddha |darśī smṛtaye tasya
smṛtaye tasya sameyivāḥ| divaukāḥ # 21 gaganaṃ khagavadgate
saṃjahṛṣe visismiye ca gaganam khaga|vat|gate ca tasmin
visismiye ca gaganam khaga|vat |gate ca tasmin nṛvaraḥ
khaga|vat|gate ca tasmin nṛvaraḥ saṃjahṛṣe visismiye
evābhimataṃ vanaṃ na bheje parivāra |janam tu|avekṣamāṇaḥ|tatas
tu|avekṣamāṇaḥ|tatas eva|abhimatam vanam na bheje # 23 sa jarāmaraṇakṣayaṃ
vanam na bheje # 23 sa jarāmaraṇakṣayaṃ cikīrṣurvanavāsāya
matiṃ smṛtau nidhāya saḥ jarā|maraṇa|kṣayam cikīrṣuḥ|vana|vāsāya
maṇḍalaṃ dvipendraḥ praviveśa punar puram na kāmāt|vana|bhūmyāḥ|iva

punar puram na kāmāt| vana|bhūmyāḥ |iva maṇḍalam dvipa|indraḥ
bata nirvṛtā ca sā strī patiḥ|īdṛkṣaḥ iha|āyata|akṣaiḥ
nirvṛtā ca sā strī patiḥ |īdṛkṣaḥ iha|āyata|akṣaiḥ

snippet: sādhvanujñām praṇipatya ca sa| añjaliḥ |babhāṣe diśa me naradevaiḥ
sa|añjaliḥ|babhāṣe diśa me naradeva iḥ sādhu|anujñām parivivrajiṣāmi
kariṇevābhihato drumaścacāla iti tasya vacaḥ niśamya rājā kariṇā|iva|abhihataḥ
bāṣpakaṇṭhaḥ kamala|pratime añjalau gṛhītvā vacanam ca|idam|uvāca
vākyamidaṃ niśamya rājñaḥ kalaviṅka svara uttaraṃ babhāṣe
vākyam|idam niśamya rājñaḥ kalaviṅk a|svaraḥ uttaram babhāṣe
tapovanaṃ śrayiṣye yadi mama pratibhūḥ|caturṣu rājñ
mama pratibhūḥ|caturṣu rājñ bhavasi tvam na tapas|vanam
bhavasi tvam na tapas| vanam śrayiṣye # 35 na bhavenmaraṇāya
durlabham artham ūcivasam tanayam vākyam|uvāca śākya|rājaḥ
tanayasya nirmumukṣoḥ iti bhūmipatiḥ |niśamya tasya vyavasāyam
tatas vimānam vapuṣā sūryaḥ iva pradīpyamānaḥ

rakṣaṇam|uttamān|ca kāmān # 40 sacivaistu nidarśito yathāvad bahumānātpraṇayācca śāstrapūrvam sacivaiḥ|tu nidarśitaḥ yathāvat bahu|mānāt|praṇayāt|ca śāstra|pūrvam guruṇā ca nivārito 'śrupātaiḥ praviveśāvasathaṃ tataḥ sa śocan guruṇā ca nivāritaḥ aśru|pātaiḥ praviveśa|āvasatham tatas saḥ śocan # 41 calakuṇḍalacumbitānanābhirghananiśvāsavikampitastanībhiḥ cala|kuṇḍala|cumbita|ānanābhiḥ|ghana|niśvāsa|vikampita|stanābhiḥ vanitābhir adhīralocanābhir mṛgaśāvābhir ivābhyudīkṣyamāṇaḥ vanitābhiḥ adhīra|locanābhiḥ mṛga|śāvābhiḥ iva|abhyudīkṣyamāṇaḥ # 42 sa hi kāñcanaparvatāvadāto hṛdayonmādakaro varāṅganānām saḥ hi kāñcana|parvata|avadātaḥ hṛdaya|unmāda|karaḥ vara|aṅganānām śravaṇāṅgavilocanātmabhāvānvacanasparśavapurguṇairjahāra śravaṇa|aṅga|vilocana|ātma|bhāvān|vacana|sparśa|vapus|guṇaiḥ|jahāra # 43 vigate divase tato vimānaṃ vapuṣā sūrya iva pradīpyamānaḥ vigate divase tatas vimānam vapuṣā sūryaḥ iva pradīpyamānaḥ timiraṃ vijighāṃsurātmabhāsā ravirudyanniva merumāruroha timiram vijighāṃsuḥ|ātma|bhāsā raviḥ|udyan|iva merum|āruroha # 44 kanakojjvaladīptadīpavṛkṣaṃ varakālāgurudhūpapūrṇagarbham kanaka|ujjvala|dīpta|dīpavṛkṣam vara|kālāguru|dhūpa|pūrṇa|garbham adhiruhya sa vajrabhakticitraṃ pravaraṃ kāñcanamāsanaṃ siṣeve adhiruhya saḥ vajra|bhakti|citram pravaram kāñcanam|āsanam siṣeve # 45 tata uttamamuttamāṅganāstaṃ niśi tūryairupatasthurindrakalpam tatas uttamam|uttama|aṅganāḥ|tam niśi tūryaiḥ|upatasthuḥ|indra|kalpam himavacchirasīva candragaure draviṇendrātmajamapsarogaṇaughāḥ himavat|śirasi|iva candra|gaure draviṇa|indra|ātmajam|apsaras|gaṇa|oghāḥ # 46 paramairapi divyatūryakalpaiḥ sa tu tairnaiva ratiṃ yayau na harṣam paramaiḥ|api divya|tūrya|kalpaiḥ saḥ tu taiḥ|na|eva ratim yayau na harṣam paramārthasukhāya tasya sādhor abhiniścikramiṣā yato na reme parama|artha|sukhāya tasya sādhoḥ abhiniścikramiṣā yatas na reme # 47 atha tatra suraistapovariṣṭhairakaniṣṭhairvyavasāyamasya buddhvā atha tatra suraiḥ|tapas|variṣṭhaiḥ|akaniṣṭhaiḥ|vyavasāyam|asya buddhvā yugapatpramadājanasya nidrā vihitāsīdvikṛtāśca gātraceṣṭāḥ yugapad|pramadā|janasya nidrā vihitā|āsīt|vikṛtāḥ|ca gātra|ceṣṭāḥ # 48 abhavacchayitā hi tatra kācidviniveśya pracale kare kapolam abhavat|śayitā hi tatra kācid|viniveśya pracale kare kapolam dayitāmapi rukmapattracitrāṃ kupitevāṅkagatāṃ vihāya vīṇām dayitām|api rukma|pattra|citrām kupitā|iva|aṅka|gatām vihāya vīṇām # 49 vibabhau karalagnaveṇuranyā stanavisrastasitāṃśukā śayānā vibabhau kara|lagna|veṇuḥ|anyā stana|visrasta|sita|aṃśukā śayānā ṛjuṣaṭpadapaṅktijuṣṭapadmā jalaphenaprahasattaṭā nadīva ṛju|ṣaṭpada|paṅkti|juṣṭa|padmā jala|phena|prahasat|taṭā nadī|iva # 50 navapuṣkaragarbhakomalābhyāṃ tapanīyojjvalasaṃgatāṅgadābhyām nava|puṣkara|garbha|komalābhyām tapanīya|ujjvala|saṃgata|aṅgadābhyām svapiti sma tathāparā bhujābhyāṃ parirabhya priyavanmṛdaṅgameva svapiti sma tathā|aparā bhujābhyām parirabhya priya|vat|mṛdaṅgam|eva # 51 navahāṭakabhūṣaṇāstathānyā vasanaṃ pītamanuttamaṃ vasānāḥ nava|hāṭaka|bhūṣaṇāḥ|tathā|anyāḥ vasanam pītam|anuttamam vasānāḥ avaśā ghananidrayā nipeturgajabhagnā iva karṇikāraśākhāḥ avaśāḥ ghana|nidrayā nipetuḥ|gaja|bhagnāḥ iva karṇikāra|śākhāḥ # 52 avalambya gavākṣapārśvamanyā śayitā cāpavibhugnagātrayaṣṭiḥ avalambya gavākṣa|pārśvam|anyā śayitā cāpa|vibhugna|gātra|yaṣṭiḥ virarāja vilambicāruhārā racitā toraṇaśālabhañjikeva virarāja vilambi|cāru|hārā racitā toraṇa|śālabhañjikā|iva # 53 maṇikuṇḍaladaṣṭapattralekhaṃ mukhapadmaṃ vinataṃ tathāparasyāḥ maṇi|kuṇḍala|daṣṭa|pattra|lekham mukha|padmam vinatam tathā|aparasyāḥ śatapattram ivārdhavakranāḍaṃ sthitakāraṇḍavaghaṭṭitaṃ śatapattram sthita|kāraṇḍava|ghaṭṭitam cakāśe # 54 aparāḥ śayitā yathopaviṣṭāḥ stanabhārair avanamyamānagātrāḥ aparāḥ śayitāḥ yathā|upaviṣṭāḥ stana|bhāraiḥ avanamyamāna|gātrāḥ upaguhya parasparaṃ virejurbhujapāśaistapanīyaparihāryaiḥ upaguhya parasparam virejuḥ|bhuja|pāśaiḥ|tapanīya|parihāryaiḥ # 55 mahatīṃ parivādinīṃ ca kācidvanitāliṅgya sakhīmiva prasuptā mahatīm parivādinīm ca kācid|vanitā|āliṅgya sakhīm|iva prasuptā vijughūrṇa calatsuvarṇasūtrā vadanenākulakarṇikojjvalena vijughūrṇa calat|suvarṇa|sūtrā vadanena|ākula|karṇikā|ujjvalena # 56 paṇavaṃ yuvatirbhujāṃsadeśād avavisraṃsitacārupāśam anyā paṇavam yuvatiḥ|bhuja|aṃsa|deśāt avavisraṃsita|cāru|pāśam anyā ūrvor vivare kāntamivābhinīya śiśye ūruvoḥ vivare kāntam|iva|abhinīya śiśye # 57 aparā babhūvurnimīlitākṣyo vipulākṣyo 'pi śubhabhruvo 'pi satyaḥ aparāḥ babhūvuḥ|nimīlita|akṣāḥ vipula|akṣāḥ api śubha|None api satyaḥ pratisaṃkucitāravindakośāḥ savitaryastamite yathā nalinyaḥ pratisaṃkucita|aravinda|kośāḥ savitri|astam|ite yathā nalinyaḥ # 58 śithilākulamūrdhajā tathānyā jaghanasrastavibhūṣaṇāṃśukāntā śithila|ākula|mūrdhajā tathā|anyā jaghana|srasta|vibhūṣaṇa|aṃśuka|antā aśayiṣṭa vikīrṇakaṇṭhasūtrā gajabhagnā pratiyātanāṅganeva aśayiṣṭa vikīrṇa|kaṇṭha|sūtrā gaja|bhagnā pratiyātanā|aṅganā|iva # 59 aparāstvavaśā hriyā viyuktā dhṛtimatyo 'pi vapurguṇairupetāḥ aparāḥ|tu|avaśāḥ hriyā viyuktāḥ dhṛtimatyaḥ api vapus|guṇaiḥ|upetāḥ viniśaśvasurulbaṇaṃ śayānā vikṛtāḥ kṣiptabhūjā jajṛmbhire ca viniśaśvasuḥ|ulbaṇam śayānāḥ vikṛtāḥ kṣipta|bhūjāḥ jajṛmbhire ca # 60 vyapaviddhavibhūṣaṇasrajo 'nyā visṛtāgranthanavāsaso visaṃjñāḥ vyapaviddha|vibhūṣaṇa|srajaḥ anyāḥ visṛta|āgranthana|vāsasaḥ visaṃjñāḥ animīlitaśuklaniścalākṣyo na virejuḥ śayitā gatāsukalpāḥ animīlita|śukla|niścala|akṣāḥ na virejuḥ śayitāḥ gatāsu|kalpāḥ # 61 vivṛtāsyapuṭā vivṛddhagātrī prapatadvaktrajalā prakāśaguhyā vivṛta|āsya|puṭā vivṛddha|gātrā prapatat|vaktra|jalā prakāśa|guhyā aparā madaghūrṇiteva śiśye na babhāse vikṛtaṃ vapuḥ pupoṣa aparā mada|ghūrṇitā|iva śiśye na babhāse vikṛtam vapuḥ pupoṣa # 62 iti sattvakulānvayānurūpaṃ vividhaṃ sa pramadājanaḥ śayānaḥ iti sattva|kula|anvaya|anurūpam vividham saḥ pramadā|janaḥ śayānaḥ sarasaḥ sadṛśaṃ babhāra rūpaṃ sarasaḥ sadṛśam babhāra rūpam # 63 samavekṣya tathā tathā śayānā vikṛtāstā yuvatīradhīraceṣṭāḥ samavekṣya tathā tathā śayānāḥ vikṛtāḥ|tāḥ yuvatīḥ|adhīra|ceṣṭāḥ guṇavadvapuṣo 'pi valgubhāṣā nṛpasūnuḥ sa vigarhayāṃbabhūva guṇavān|None api valgu|bhāṣāḥ nṛpa|sūnuḥ saḥ vigarhayāṃbabhūva # 64 aśucirvikṛtaśca jīvaloke vanitānāmayamīdṛśaḥ svabhāvaḥ aśuciḥ|vikṛtaḥ|ca jīva|loke vanitānām|ayam|īdṛśaḥ svabhāvaḥ vasanābharaṇaistu vañcyamānaḥ puruṣaḥ strīviṣayeṣu rāgameti vasana|ābharaṇaiḥ|tu vañcyamānaḥ puruṣaḥ strī|viṣayeṣu rāgam|eti # 65 vimṛśedyadi yoṣitāṃ manuṣyaḥ prakṛtiṃ svapnavikāramīdṛśaṃ ca vimṛśet|yadi yoṣitām manuṣyaḥ prakṛtim svapna|vikāram|īdṛśam ca dhruvamatra na vardhayetpramādaṃ guṇasaṃkalpahatastu rāgameti dhruvam|atra na vardhayet|pramādam guṇa|saṃkalpa|hataḥ|tu rāgam|eti # 66 iti tasya tadantaraṃ viditvā niśi niścikramiṣā samudbabhūva iti tasya tat|antaram viditvā niśi niścikramiṣā samudbabhūva avagamya manastato 'sya devairbhavanadvāramapāvṛtaṃ babhūva avagamya manaḥ|tatas asya devaiḥ|bhavana|dvāram|apāvṛtam babhūva # 67 atha so 'vatatāra harmyapṛṣṭhādyuvatīstāḥ śayitā vigarhamāṇaḥ atha saḥ avatatāra harmya|pṛṣṭhāt|yuvatīḥ|tāḥ śayitāḥ vigarhamāṇaḥ avatīrya tataśca nirviśaṅko gṛhakakṣyāṃ prathamāṃ vinirjagāma avatīrya tatas|ca nirviśaṅkaḥ gṛha|kakṣyām prathamām vinirjagāma # 68 turagāvacaraṃ

devaiḥ|bhavana|dvāram|apāvṛtam babhūva # 67 atha so 'vatatāra harmyapṛṣṭhādyuvatīstāḥ śayitā vigarhamāṇaḥ atha saḥ avatatāra harmya|pṛṣṭhāt|yuvatīḥ|tāḥ śayitāḥ vigarhamāṇaḥ avatīrya tataśca nirviśaṅko gṛhakakṣyāṃ prathamāṃ vinirjagāma avatīrya tatas|ca nirviśaṅkaḥ gṛha|kakṣyām prathamām vinirjagāma # 68 turagāvacaraṃ sa bodhayitvā javinaṃ chandakamitthamityuvāca turaga|avacaram saḥ bodhayitvā javinam chandakam|ittham|iti|uvāca hayamānaya kanthakaṃ tvarāvānamṛtaṃ prāptumito 'dya me yiyāsā hayam|ānaya kanthakam tvarāvān|amṛtam prāptum|itas adya mama yiyāsā # 69 hṛdi yā mama tuṣṭiradya jātā vyavasāyaśca yathā matau niviṣṭaḥ hṛdi yā mama tuṣṭiḥ|adya jātā vyavasāyaḥ|ca yathā matau niviṣṭaḥ vijane 'pi ca nāthavānivāsmi dhruvamartho 'bhimukhaḥ sameta iṣṭaḥ vijane api ca nāthavān|iva|asmi dhruvam|arthaḥ abhimukhaḥ sametaḥ iṣṭaḥ # 70 hriyameva ca saṃnatiṃ ca hitvā śayitā matpramukhe yathā yuvatyaḥ hriyam|eva ca saṃnatim ca hitvā śayitāḥ mad|pramukhe yathā yuvatyaḥ vivṛte ca yathā svayaṃ kapāṭe niyataṃ yātumato mamādya kālaḥ vivṛte ca yathā svayam kapāṭe niyatam yātum|atas mama|adya kālaḥ # 71 pratigṛhya tataḥ sa bharturājñāṃ viditārtho 'pi narendraśāsanasya pratigṛhya tatas saḥ bhartuḥ|ājñām vidita|arthaḥ api narendra|śāsanasya manasīva pareṇa codyamānasturagasyānayane matiṃ cakāra manasi|iva pareṇa codyamānaḥ|turagasya|ānayane matim cakāra # 72 atha hemakhalīnapūrṇavaktraṃ laghuśayyāstaraṇopagūḍhapṛṣṭham atha hema|khalīna|pūrṇa|vaktram laghu|śayyā|āstaraṇa|upagūḍha|pṛṣṭham balasattvajavānvayopapannaṃ sa varāśvaṃ tamupānināya bhartre bala|sattva|java|anvaya|upapannam saḥ vara|aśvam tam|upānināya bhartre # 73 pratatatrikapucchamūlapārṣṇiṃ nibhṛtahrasvatanūjapucchakarṇam pratata|trika|puccha|mūla|pārṣṇim nibhṛta|hrasva|tanūja|puccha|karṇam vinatonnatapṛṣṭhakukṣipārśvaṃ vipulaprothalalāṭakaṭyuraskam vinata|unnata|pṛṣṭha|kukṣi|pārśvam vipula|protha|lalāṭa|kaṭi|uraskam # 74 upaguhya sa taṃ viśālavakṣāḥ kamalābhena ca sāntvayan kareṇa upaguhya saḥ tam viśāla|vakṣāḥ kamala|ābhena ca sāntvayan kareṇa madhurākṣarayā girā śaśāsa dhvajinīmadhyamiva praveṣṭukāmaḥ madhura|akṣarayā girā śaśāsa dhvajinī|madhyam|iva praveṣṭu|kāmaḥ # 75 bahuśaḥ kila śatravo nirastāḥ samare tvāmadhiruhya pārthivena bahuśas kila śatravaḥ nirastāḥ samare tvā|adhiruhya pārthivena ahamapyamṛtaṃ padaṃ yathāvatturagaśreṣṭha labheya tatkuruṣva aham|api|amṛtam padam yathāvat|turaga|śreṣṭhaiḥ labheya tat|kuruṣva # 76 sulabhāḥ khalu saṃyuge sahāyā viṣayāvāptasukhe dhanārjane vā sulabhāḥ khalu saṃyuge sahāyāḥ viṣaya|avāpta|sukhe dhana|arjane vā puruṣasya tu durlabhāḥ sahāyāḥ patitasyāpadi dharmasaṃśraye vā puruṣasya tu durlabhāḥ sahāyāḥ patitasya|āpadi dharma|saṃśraye vā # 77 iha caiva bhavanti ye sahāyaḥ kaluṣe karmaṇi dharmasaṃśraye vā iha ca|eva bhavanti ye sahāyaḥ kaluṣe karmaṇi dharma|saṃśraye vā avagacchati me yathāntarātmā niyataṃ te 'pi janāstadaṃśabhājaḥ avagacchati mama yathā|antarātmā niyatam te api janāḥ|tad|aṃśa|bhājaḥ # 78 tadidaṃ parigamya dharmayuktaṃ mama niryāṇamito jagaddhitāya tat|idam parigamya dharma|yuktam mama niryāṇam|itas jagat|hitāya turagottama vegavikramābhyāṃ prayatasvātmahite jagaddhite ca turaga|uttamaiḥ vega|vikramābhyām prayatasva|ātma|hite jagat|hite ca # 79 iti suhṛdamivānuśiṣya kṛtye turagavaraṃ nṛvaro vanaṃ yiyāsuḥ iti suhṛdam|iva|anuśiṣya kṛtye turaga|varam nṛvaraḥ vanam yiyāsuḥ sitamasitagatidyutirvapuṣmān raviriva śāradamabhramāruroha sitam|asita|gati|dyutiḥ|vapuṣmān raviḥ|iva śāradam|abhram|āruroha # 80 atha sa pariharanniśīthacaṇḍaṃ parijanabodhakaraṃ dhvaniṃ sadaśvaḥ atha saḥ pariharat|niśītha|caṇḍam parijana|bodha|karam dhvanim sat|aśvaḥ vigatahanuravaḥ praśāntaheṣaścakitavimuktapadakramo jagāma vigata|hanu|ravaḥ praśānta|heṣaḥ|cakita|vimukta|pada|kramaḥ jagāma # 81 kanakavalayabhūṣitaprakoṣṭhaiḥ kamalanibhaiḥ kamalāniva pravidhya kanaka|valaya|bhūṣita|prakoṣṭhaiḥ kamala|nibhaiḥ kamalān|iva pravidhya avanatatanavastato 'sya yakṣāścakitagatair dadhire khurān karāgraiḥ avanata|tanavaḥ|tatas asya yakṣāḥ|cakita|gataiḥ dadhire khurān kara|agraiḥ # 82 guruparighakapāṭasaṃvṛtā yā na sukhamapi dviradair apāvriyante guru|parigha|kapāṭa|saṃvṛtāḥ yāḥ na sukham|api dviradaiḥ apāvriyante vrajati nṛpasute gatasvanāstāḥ svayamabhavanvivṛtāḥ puraḥ pratolyaḥ vrajati nṛpa|sute gata|svanāḥ|tāḥ svayam|abhavan|vivṛtāḥ None pratolyaḥ # 83 pitaramabhimukhaṃ sutaṃ ca bālaṃ janamanuraktamanuttamāṃ ca lakṣmīm pitaram|abhimukham sutam ca bālam janam|anuraktam|anuttamām ca lakṣmīm kṛtamatirapahāya nirvyapekṣaḥ pitṛnagarātsa tato vinirjagāma kṛtamatiḥ|apahāya nirvyapekṣaḥ pitṛ|nagarāt|saḥ tatas vinirjagāma # 84 atha sa vimalapaṅkajāyatākṣaḥ puramavalokya nanāda siṃhanādam atha saḥ vimala|paṅkaja|āyata|akṣaḥ puram|avalokya nanāda siṃhanādam jananamaraṇayoradṛṣṭapāro na puramahaṃ kapilāhvayaṃ praveṣṭā janana|maraṇayoḥ|adṛṣṭa|pāraḥ na puram|aham kapila|āhvayam praveṣṭā # 85 iti vacanamidaṃ niśamya tasya draviṇapateḥ pariṣadgaṇā nananduḥ iti vacanam|idam niśamya tasya draviṇa|pateḥ pariṣad|gaṇāḥ nananduḥ pramuditamanasaśca devasaṅghā vyavasitapāraṇamāśaśaṃsire 'smai pramudita|manasaḥ|ca deva|saṃghāḥ vyavasita|pāraṇam|āśaśaṃsire asmai # 86 hutavahavapuṣoḥ divaukaso 'nye vyavasitamasya suduṣkaraṃ viditvā hutavaha|vapuṣaḥ divaukasaḥ anye vyavasitam|asya su|duṣkaram viditvā tuhine pathi prakāśaṃ ghanavivaraprasṛtā ivendupādāḥ tuhine pathini prakāśam ghana|vivara|prasṛtāḥ iva|indu|pādāḥ # 87 harituragaturaṅgavatturaṅgaḥ sa tu vicaranmanasīva codyamānaḥ hari|turaga|turaṃga|vat|turaṃgaḥ saḥ tu vicaran|manasi|iva codyamānaḥ aruṇaparuṣatāram antarikṣaṃ sa ca subahūni jagāma yojanāni aruṇa|paruṣa|tāram antarikṣam saḥ ca su|bahūni jagāma yojanāni # 88 iti buddhacarite mahākāvye 'bhiniṣkramaṇo nāma pañcamaḥ sargaḥ iti buddhacarite mahākāvye abhiniṣkramaṇaḥ nāma pañcamaḥ sargaḥ

manasi|iva pareṇa codyamānaḥ| turagasya| ānayane matim cakāra
saḥ vara|aśvam tam| upānināya bhartre # 73 pratatatrikapucchamūlapārṣṇiṃ

tam|upānināya bhartre # 73 pratatatrikapucchamūlapārṣṇiṃ nibhṛtahrasvatanūjapucchakarṇam pratata|trika|puccha|mūla|pārṣṇim nibhṛta|hrasva|tanūja|puccha|karṇam vinatonnatapṛṣṭhakukṣipārśvaṃ vipulaprothalalāṭakaṭyuraskam vinata|unnata|pṛṣṭha|kukṣi|pārśvam vipula|protha|lalāṭa|kaṭi|uraskam # 74 upaguhya sa taṃ
ca sāntvayan kareṇa upaguhya saḥ tam viśāla|vakṣāḥ
upaguhya saḥ tam viśāla| vakṣāḥ kamala|ābhena ca sāntvayan
saḥ tam viśāla|vakṣāḥ kamala |ābhena ca sāntvayan
viśāla|vakṣāḥ kamala|ābhena ca sāntvayan kareṇa madhurākṣarayā
kamala|ābhena ca sāntvayan kareṇa madhurākṣarayā girā
kila śatravaḥ nirastāḥ samare tvā|adhiruhya pārthivena
nirastāḥ samare tvā| adhiruhya pārthivena ahamapyamṛtaṃ
parijana|bodha|karam dhvanim sat| aśvaḥ vigatahanuravaḥ praśāntaheṣaścakitavimuktapadakramo
dadhire khurān karāgraiḥ avanata |tanavaḥ|tatas asya yakṣāḥ|cakita|gataiḥ
apāvriyante guru|parigha| kapāṭa |saṃvṛtāḥ yāḥ na sukham|api
guru|parigha|kapāṭa|saṃvṛtāḥ yāḥ na sukham|api dviradaiḥ apāvriyante vrajati
svayamabhavanvivṛtāḥ puraḥ pratolyaḥ vrajati nṛpa|sute gata|svanāḥ|tāḥ
